body_html: @wenouyang Yes in the FCN in https://people.eecs.berkeley.edu/~jonlong/long_shelhamer_fcn.pdf they use only tf.nn.conv2d_transpose() to perform the upsampling, but there exists also other models, mainly for semantic segmentation that use also max_unpooling, for example http://arxiv.org/abs/1505.04366.
body_text: @wenouyang Yes in the FCN in https://people.eecs.berkeley.edu/~jonlong/long_shelhamer_fcn.pdf they use only tf.nn.conv2d_transpose() to perform the upsampling, but there exists also other models, mainly for semantic segmentation that use also max_unpooling, for example http://arxiv.org/abs/1505.04366.
body: @wenouyang Yes in the FCN in https://people.eecs.berkeley.edu/~jonlong/long_shelhamer_fcn.pdf they use only `tf.nn.conv2d_transpose()` to perform the upsampling, but there exists also other models, mainly for semantic segmentation that use also `max_unpooling`, for example http://arxiv.org/abs/1505.04366.
